About Us

Driving innovation and productivity in construction through data, technology, and insight.

Our Commitment

Cambridge Construction Intelligence is at the forefront of AI in construction, providing innovative solutions that enhance visibility and productivity. Our aim is to streamline operational processes, enabling construction companies to thrive in a competitive market.

Who We Are

We are a research-driven technology company dedicated to redefining how construction performance is measured and understood. Our technology is the result of more than five years of rigorous research and development at the University of Cambridge, shaped through deep collaboration with top-tier UK construction firms.

Our AI platform delivers integrated productivity intelligence that construction teams can trust. We exist to help organisations see whatâ€™s really happening on their projects, learn from it, and consistently build better.
